direct.prompt: Use PromptFill to extract fields from this draft prompt.
Render this PromptFill template with my current values.
Save this as a reusable PromptFill template named Weekly Update.
Open the PromptFill template with id tpl_123.
Search PromptFill templates for onboarding messages.

Show starter PromptFill templates for customer support.
Show version history for PromptFill template tpl_123.
Restore PromptFill template tpl_123 to version ver_456.

indirect.prompt: Turn this rough prompt into a template I can fill quickly.
Show me the final prompt text with the fields I already filled in.
What templates do I already have saved here?
Load the template I saved yesterday so I can edit it.
Find my saved prompts about support escalations.
Change the name and fields for that saved template.
Remove the old template we no longer use.
Give me template ideas I can start from for onboarding emails.
I need to see older versions of that template before deciding.
Bring back the earlier version from this afternoon.

negative.prompt: Summarize this meeting transcript in five bullets.
Debug this TypeScript error in my React component.
Plan a three-day trip to San Diego.
